text: The 2022 BWF World Championships is a badminton tournament which will be held in Tokyo, Japan. ==Host city selection== Tokyo was awarded the event in November 2018 during the announcement of 18 major badminton event hosts from 2019 to 2025. ==References== Category:BWF World Championships Category:International sports competitions hosted by Japan Category:Badminton tournaments in Japan Category:Sport in Tokyo BWF World Championships BWF World
title: 2022 BWF World Championships
